author: Cassidy Alexander

Cobb is using federal pandemic aid to offer the compensation to permanent full-time and part-time employees, who will receive the bonus in April.
Employees in the Cobb County School District will receive a $2,000 bonus, Superintendent Chris Ragsdale recently announced.
Brian Kemp previous approved a midyear budget with $2,000 bonuses for some school employees, including teachers.
